UI.Screens.RecommenderScreen.RecommenderScreen module

class UI.Screens.RecommenderScreen.RecommenderScreen.RecommenderScreen(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)

Bases: Screen

Code associated to the screen that recommends songs, first of all loads the attributes and songs from their directory.

dismiss_popup()

Use to cancel a process (for instance, is going to be used to cancel the “image window” in the UI)

image_view = None
load(path, filename)

Saves the selected image’s path and shows the image

Parameters

  • path (PathLike) – path of the image

  • filename (String) – name of the image

Code associated to the botton to pause the song, use to pause the song

play_song()

Code associated to the botton to play the song use to reproduce the recommended song

recommend()

Calls to the function recommend_async that is run in a new thread

recommend_async()

function that recommends a song and shows in the screen the name of the song

recommended_song_label = None
show_load()

Shows the window to choose the image

stop_song()

Code associated to the botten that stops the song, when this botton is clicked the song is pause and also restart.
